FiftyThree, Inc. - NYC - Fulltime - No Remote - H1B transfers only.

Paper was 2012 App of the Year on iPad and was downloaded more than 7 million times.

Paper is just the beginning, and we’re hard at work on what’s next.

We’re looking for app developers (but we’d also love to talk to web devs, backend devs and designers).

• Love creating beautiful user experiences? We’re a design-driven company, and you’ll have the opportunity to work closely with world-class designers. In the last year, Paper won numerous design awards including the Apple Design Award, IxDA, AIGA, and a Crunchie.

• Enjoy a technical challenge? Interesting problems abound.

• We’re a startup but we’re on solid financial ground. We offer competitive salary, benefits, and equity.

Apply at jobs@fiftythree.com

http://fiftythree.com

Have a look at what our users are up to: http://madewithpaper.fiftythree.com/
